thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: James Comey Book Hits No. 1 in First Week

author: Jeffrey A. Trachtenberg
title: James Comey Book Hits No. 1 in First Week
text:
Former FBI Director James Comey’s “A Higher Loyalty: Truth, Lies, and Leadership” sold more than 600,000 copies in all formats in its first week, the publisher said Tuesday, making the memoir a hit by any standard.
Macmillan’s Flatiron Books described Mr. Comey’s book as “the best-selling English language book in the world last week.” The publisher added that it has gone back to press several times, and there are now more than 1 million copies in print.
...
